 Cstorage::types::BindTraits< T >Bind traits are used to bind a C or C++ data type to a storage::data::Row object or get/set a storage::data::Field object. This template class is specialized for each data type

 Cstorage::types::CharacterVarying< N, charT >The CharacterVarying class is a buffer for database strings. The buffer size can only be set when the object is created so that bindings to the object will remain stable

 Cstorage::ittiadb::TransactionAtomically commits or rolls back changes made to a database through a specific connection and releases any locks held by that connection. A transaction must be committed to preserve changes or share changes with other concurrent connections
